content: Comments The information is provided monthly by Cl- ENERGIES, and contradictorily reconciled with CIE off-taker at invoicing stage. The electricity generated and delivered by Soubr√© to the grid is monitored both at the hydropower plant departure and at the substation delivery points, through metering equipments with a respective accuracy of 0.2% all, and invoiced monthly to CIE based on the reconciled, signed joint readings of delivered net electricity (after transmission losses). The meters have been verified by the central direction of energy transport and telecommunications sub-direction maintenance / control department of Cl- Energie on 18 February 2021. The next calibration has been done from 15/12/2022 tec 90N/19/9099 valid tntil 14/19/9092 for The justification has been checked and found correct which is already justified above. Last calibration of the energy meters was done- on 18/02/2021 and latest calibration was done in December 2022 /23/ by government authority. Since the calibration was delayed, PP has applied the maximum error 0.204% identified during the latest calibrations (December 2022) /23/ for the period from 01/07/2022 to 31/12/2022 and monthly electricity export and import has been corrected accordinsly.
